articles.title: European Union recommends new travel restrictions for unvaccinated Americans - The Washington Post
articles.description: The proposed travel restrictions come with caveats: They are not legally binding, and it's up to E.U. members to decide whether to implement them.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: WHO warns that Covid-19 deaths in Europe are rising - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Of the WHO Europe’s 53 nations, 33 registered an incidence rate greater than 10% in the past two weeks, while deaths have increased by 11%.
articles.content: THE WORLD HEALTH Organization has warned that another 236,000 people could die from Covid-19 in Europe by 1 December, sounding the alarm over rising infections and stagnating vaccine rates on the con… [+3613 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Coronavirus booster shots 'not a luxury', WHO Europe head says - The Star Online
articles.description: COPENHAGEN (Reuters) -A third-dose booster shot of the COVID-19 vaccination is a way to keep the most vulnerable safe and "not a luxury", the World Health Organization said on Monday.
articles.content:
